divs: sighting detailsi moved to a new place in burnaby, bc. on sat 20 i came home and noticed a cell phone tower that i didn't notice before. i didn't think anything of it! on sun 21st at 10pm i was smoking outside sitting in a chair looking to the n-w......where the tower is. that's when i realized that it was not a tower....but a low...really low star. or plane or chopper or what ever. but it did not move for an hour and blinked fast 5-6 different colours. it was really trying to blend in with the sky.....i was confused! it did a zig-zag move dropped lower and i lost sight of it. i estimate it's location near hendry park(east vancouver\burnaby).
Summary: It was trying to look like a star!
trends: There have been 33 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around October 21st 2008
